mapper.select: SELECT e.guid,e.emp_Code,e.emp_Name,e.emp_Realname,e.gender,e.empstatus,e.guid_Org,e.guid_Position,e.guid_Emp_Major,e.indate,e.outdate,e.mobileno,e.paper_Type,e.paper_No,e.birthdate,e.htel,e.haddress,e.hzipcode,e.guid_Operator,e.user_Id,e.remark FROM OM_EMPLOYEE e WHERE guid IN ( SELECT guid_emp FROM OM_EMP_ORG WHERE guid_org = #{guidorg}) AND guid IN (SELECT guid_emp FROM OM_EMP_POSITION WHERE guid_Position = #{guidPosition})
